name: Code the Dream
description: Code the Dream expands access to tech careers for individuals from underrepresented communities through free coding education and paid apprenticeships. By combining training with real-world experience, the program builds skills, creates opportunity, and delivers technology that benefits communities.

name: Student U
description: Student U is a Durham-based nonprofit working to create a more equitable education system by supporting students facing systemic barriers. Through long-term academic and college-access support, Student U helps students reach their full potential.

name: Youth LEAD NC
description: Youth LEAD NC is a nonprofit that empowers individuals with disabilities ages 30 and under through peer support and leadership development, preparing them to succeed in education, employment, independent living, and community leadership.

name: North Carolina Civics Coalition (NC3)
description: The North Carolina Civics Coalition (NC3) is a nonpartisan organization dedicated to strengthening and advancing Kâ€“12 civic education across North Carolina.
